className.description: Custom css classes for the input element

debounce.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after the last keystroke before sending the query.

defaultQuery.description: SPARQL SELECT query string. If present will be used to show default suggestions without the need for the user to type anything.

domain.description:
Specify search domain category IRI (full IRI enclosed in <>).
Required, if component is used together with facets.

escapeLuceneSyntax.description:
A flag determining whether any special Lucene syntax will be escaped.
When `false` lucene syntax in the user input is not escaped.

initialInput.description: Initial input to be shown in the input field.

minSearchTermLength.description: Minimum number of input characters that triggers the search.

minTokenLength.description:
If tokenizeLuceneQuery is true, this parameter can be used to
filter out tokens shorter than the specified length.

When set, e.g. minTokenLength=3, and the input string is "an apple",
only "apple*" will be propagated to the query.

When undefined (default), no token length filtering is applied,
preserving backward-compatible behavior where all tokens are included.

query.description: SPARQL SELECT query string. Needs to have a variable named as `__token__`(can be customized with searchTermVariable) that will be replaces with the user input.

style.description: Custom css styles for the input element

tokenizeLuceneQuery.description:
A flag determining whether the user input is tokenized by whitespace into words postfixed by `*`.
E.g. the search for `Hello World` becomes `Hello* World*`.
